description:
Once creating a volume  failed,  we can't no longer create a volume successfully. we find the creating message in /var/long/auth.log 


// creating error message
Nov  9 15:07:57 stack-dragon sudo:    stack : TTY=unknown ; PWD=/opt/stack/cinder ; USER=root ; COMMAND=/usr/local/bin/cinder-rootwrap /etc/cinder/rootwrap.conf lvcreate -L 1G -n volume-3f5d71d5-c973-41d7-950c-b4d7ef2e611f stack-volumes
Nov  9 15:07:57 stack-dragon sudo: pam_unix(sudo:session): session opened for user root by (uid=1000)
Nov  9 15:07:57 stack-dragon sudo: pam_unix(sudo:session): session closed for user root
Nov  9 15:07:58 stack-dragon sudo:    stack : TTY=unknown ; PWD=/opt/stack/cinder ; USER=root ; COMMAND=/usr/local/bin/cinder-rootwrap /etc/cinder/rootwrap.conf lvcreate -L 1G -n volume-3f5d71d5-c973-41d7-950c-b4d7ef2e611f stack-volumes
Nov  9 15:07:58 stack-dragon sudo: pam_unix(sudo:session): session opened for user root by (uid=1000)
Nov  9 15:07:58 stack-dragon sudo: pam_unix(sudo:session): session closed for user root
Nov  9 15:08:02 stack-dragon sudo:    stack : TTY=unknown ; PWD=/opt/stack/cinder ; USER=root ; COMMAND=/usr/local/bin/cinder-rootwrap /etc/cinder/rootwrap.conf lvcreate -L 1G -n volume-3f5d71d5-c973-41d7-950c-b4d7ef2e611f stack-volumes
Nov  9 15:08:02 stack-dragon sudo: pam_unix(sudo:session): session opened for user root by (uid=1000)
Nov  9 15:08:02 stack-dragon sudo: pam_unix(sudo:session): session closed for user root
title: we can't create a volume on dashboard under devstack

comments.content:
Once creating a volume  failed,  we can't no longer create a volume successfully. we find the creating message in /var/long/auth.log 


// creating error message
Nov  9 15:07:57 stack-dragon sudo:    stack : TTY=unknown ; PWD=/opt/stack/cinder ; USER=root ; COMMAND=/usr/local/bin/cinder-rootwrap /etc/cinder/rootwrap.conf lvcreate -L 1G -n volume-3f5d71d5-c973-41d7-950c-b4d7ef2e611f stack-volumes
Nov  9 15:07:57 stack-dragon sudo: pam_unix(sudo:session): session opened for user root by (uid=1000)
Nov  9 15:07:57 stack-dragon sudo: pam_unix(sudo:session): session closed for user root
